meanings.definition: To apply ethical principles or moral standards to
meanings.sent1: She ethicizes her actions by always considering what is right and wrong.
meanings.sent2: He ethicizes his business practices to ensure fairness and honesty.
meanings.sent3: The superhero ethicizes every decision to make sure justice prevails.
meanings.sent4: The wise owl ethicizes the forest, guiding all creatures to do what is good.
meanings.sent5: Ethicizing the situation, she chose to help the person in need.

meanings.definition: To make ethical judgments or decisions
meanings.sent1: The committee ethicizes on important matters affecting the community.
meanings.sent2: He ethicizes before taking any action to ensure it aligns with his values.
meanings.sent3: The robot ethicizes its programming, always choosing the morally right path.
meanings.sent4: In the court of law, the judge ethicizes to deliver fair and just verdicts.
meanings.sent5: Ethicizing carefully, she decided to donate to the charity.
